Camouflage Campsite.name: 伪装营地 Camouflage Campsite
Camouflage Campsite.text:
扎营， 操作， 秘密

需求 隐秘受训

你花费1个小时将营地隐藏起来以避免潜在的威胁，这包括用树枝覆盖帐篷，确保营火的位置能够最大限度地减少气味或烟雾的传播，并提醒其他人避免发出太大的噪音等等。尝试对地区DC进行一次隐秘检定。

你在每个扎营期内只能尝试一次伪装营地，无论结果如何。

大成功 你的伪装尝试超出预期。你营地的遭遇DC增加2点。当第一次纯骰检定的结果导致在这个扎营期内会发生随机遭遇时，纯骰检定视为失败，不发生遭遇。

成功 你的工作有助于隐藏营地不被发现。你营地的遭遇DC增加1点。

大失败 你认为自己的伪装尝试做得很好，但实际上忘记了一些重要的事情，或不小心做了一些让营地更加引人注目的事情。你营地的遭遇DC减少2点，并且判定是否发生随机遭遇的纯骰检定将在19或20得到大成功的结果。

Cook Special Meal.name: 烹饪特殊餐食 Cook Special Meal
Cook Special Meal.text:
扎营， 操作

需求 知晓该食谱

你花费2小时来准备一顿特殊餐食。选择一种队伍已经知晓食谱的特殊餐食，然后你希望准备的每份餐食都要花费相应的基础和特殊食材，以及1日份的口粮或1份求生获得的食物。

特殊餐食的食谱是一种配方，你可以从定居点购买，或通过研发特殊餐食行动来获得。

烹饪特殊餐食可以在一次扎营期内多次尝试，但是每次尝试必须使用不同的配方。

陷入恶心的角色无法食用特殊餐食或从中获得好处。

一旦队伍完成所有扎营行动，并且角色选择了他们想吃的餐食，尝试一次生存检定或烹饪学识检定来确定特殊餐食的效果。检定的DC根据不同食谱而异。除非特殊餐食另有说明，否则它的效果会持续到下次队伍准备营地时，或持续24小时，以先发生的为准。

大成功 角色获得食谱的大成功效果。

成功 角色获得食谱的成功效果。

失败 角色没有得到任何效果，但依然能填饱肚子。

大失败 角色承受食谱的大失败效果。

Discover Special Meal.name: 研发特殊餐食 Discover Special Meal
Discover Special Meal.text:
扎营， 操作

需求 烹饪学识受训

你花费2小时尝试研发一种特殊食谱。选择一种常见的特殊餐食食谱；食谱的等级必须不能高于你当前扎营地区的等级。花费正常情况下2倍的食材来准备1份特殊餐食，然后尝试该特殊餐食的烹饪学识检定。

大成功 你发现了新的特殊餐食，然后将其加入队伍的已知食谱中。此外，你的研究特别有效，你回收了尝试该行动所需的一半食材。

成功 如同大成功，但你不能回收任何食材

失败 你没有发现特殊餐食，也没回收任何食材。

大失败 类似失败，但你进行了不明智的试吃，将自己暴露在特殊食材的大失败效果之下。

Hunt and Gather.name: 狩猎和采集 Hunt and Gather
Hunt and Gather.text:
扎营， 移动

需求 生存受训

你花费2个小时收集食材。这是求生获取的食物的一种补充，额外的食材可以用来烹饪基础或特殊餐食，比单纯吃口粮能获得更多好处。尝试对地区DC进行一次狩猎学识或生存检定。

大成功 你获得地区DC两倍的基础食材，外加4份特殊食材。如果你在一个至少7级的地区进行狩猎和采集，特殊食材增加到8份；对于14级的地区增加到12份。

成功 你获得等同于地区DC的基础食材，外加[[/r 1d4]]份特殊食材。如果你在一个至少7级的地区进行狩猎和采集，特殊食材增加到[[/r 2d4]]份；对于14级的地区增加到[[/r 3d4]]份。

失败 你获得等同于地区DC的基础食材。

大失败 你找到 [[/r 1d4]]份基础食材（最多等于地区DC）。此外，你还引起了注意。进行一次额外的纯骰检定，以确定你在完成该行动之后，营地是否会发生随机遭遇。

Learn from a Companion.name: 向伙伴学习 Learn from a Companion
Learn from a Companion.text:
扎营， 专注

需求 作为学习对象的伙伴必须和你一同扎营，并且态度至少为友善。

这本书内列出的所有伙伴都有专属的特殊的扎营行动。通常，为了让PC能尝试这些特殊行动，伙伴必须也一同扎营，但是该行动允许伙伴将他们的专属特殊行动传授给 PC。你花费2小时和想要学习的伙伴待在一起，然后尝试@Check[type:perception|dc:20]检定。

大成功 你学会了该伙伴的特殊行动。任何达到行动需求的PC都能执行该行动，哪怕该伙伴没有一同扎营。

成功 你在对特殊行动的学习有一定的进步，但还需要更多时间才能掌握它。如果你在下次扎营时继续尝试向这名伙伴学习，检定的结果会提高一个成功度级别。

失败 你没能从伙伴那里学到任何东西。

大失败 你无法从伙伴那里学到任何东西，并且伙伴对队伍感到沮丧。在该扎营期内，任何人都无法再尝试向他学习。

Organize Watch.name: 组织守夜 Organize Watch
Organize Watch.text:
扎营

需求 察觉专家

你花费2小时来制定营地的守夜轮换、优化排班、侦查周围区域，以确定敌人最有可能从什么地方发动袭击。针对地区DC进行一次察觉检定。

大成功 营地的守夜很有效率，将休息的所需时间视为队伍规模+1小时，并且所有角色在守夜期间的察觉检定都有+2状态加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.Item.010XlkzzjX38BHsO]

成功 角色在守夜期间的察觉检定有+1状态加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.Item.MOXWga7l8dsypUPy]

失败 你的尝试没有获得任何好处。

大失败 如同失败，但你可能引起了不必要的注意。尝试对该地区的遭遇DC进行一次纯骰检定，以确定是否发生随机遭遇。

Provide Aid.name: 提供援助 Provide Aid
Provide Aid.text:
扎营， 专注

你花2个小时来帮助角色执行扎营行动。当你提供援助时，尝试一次技能检定，具体技能种类由GM裁定。一般来说DC是20，但GM可以根据难易程度调整DC。

你能在扎营期内多次尝试援助，但记住援助提供的环境加值不会叠加。

大成功 你赋予盟友在行动中+2环境加值。如果你尝试检定的技能达到大师，加值提升为+3，如果达到传奇，提升为+4。

成功 你赋予盟友在行动中+1环境加值。

大失败 你的盟友在行动中遭受-1环境减值。

Relax.name: 放松 Relax
Relax.text:
扎营

你花2个小时听篝火故事、聊天、阅读、冥想、打盹或只是单纯地放松。

你下次解决扎营行动的检定获得+1环境加值，前提是在同一个扎营期内。

如果角色在篝火故事会行动中遭遇大失败而受到状态减值，那么在花1个小时时间放松之后可以消除这种减值。你在一个扎营期内可以随意放松多次。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.Item.QvR2yvuIVQuztCwQ]

Tell Campfire Story.name: 篝火故事会 Tell Campfire Story
Tell Campfire Story.text:
扎营， 专注， 情绪， 听觉， 心灵

你花费2小时讲述一个令人振奋的故事，也许是你以前的冒险经历，或者在篝火旁听来的故事。如果这个故事和你最近或即将发生的冒险有关，或者和一个或多个角色的个人背景有关，GM可能会给予你的检定+1环境加值。尝试一次表演检定，针对你自己等级的标准DC。

你的所有盟友都能从你的故事中获益，但那些花时间进行放松的角色收益最大。在篝火故事会期间，那些从事狩猎和采集的盟友，或者在营地周边区域之外的盟友，不会受到篝火故事会的影响。

大成功 你极大地鼓舞了你的盟友。在扎营期剩下的时间内，你盟友在营地内的战斗时，攻击骰、豁免骰和技能检定有+2状态加值。此加成持续到休息结束后进行每日准备时。如果盟友在故事会期间选择花1个小时放松，他们除了状态加值之外，还能重投一次失败的检定；这是一个幸运效果。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.Item.2vdskbqd0VrWKR9Y]

成功 你激励了你的盟友。如同大成功，但状态加值为+1。在故事会期间选择花1个小时放松的盟友有+2状态加值，但没有大成功赋予的重投机会。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.Item.wT2NzrfgmWmCMRtv]

失败 你的盟友无动于衷，也无法得到任何好处

大失败 你的故事让盟友分心或不安。他们每个人的技能检定有-1状态减值，直到他们尝试放松，或直到开始日常准备。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.Item.y5Jqw40SWNOgcxvC]

Blend Into The Night.name: 融入黑夜 Blend Into The Night
Blend Into The Night.text: 当夜间为随机遭遇进行检定时（包括扎营途中），遭遇的纯骰检定DC增加2点。

Bolster Confidence.name: 提振信心 Bolster Confidence
Bolster Confidence.text:
其他人的所有扎营行动获得+1环境加值。如果表演达到大师熟练度，则变为+2环境加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.mAEvnTqFuLIASQLB]

Camp Management.name: 营地管理 Camp Management
Camp Management.text:
进行生存检定对抗该区域的DC，来决定管理起到了多大的作用。

大成功 在大成功后的一小时里，每位PC可以进行两次扎营行动，而非一次。但不会增加参与扎营的伙伴的行动次数。

成功 类似大成功，但只有一位PC可以在接下来一小时里进行两次扎营行动。

大失败 建议起到了反作用，导致扎营期里剩余的时间变得效率低下。在本次扎营期的剩余时间里，进行扎营行动投掷的所有检定都需要承受-2的环境减值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.vpH13xgAqX4zsU6o]

Healer's Blessing.name: 医者祝福 Healer's Blessing
Healer's Blessing.text:
当队伍在营地中休息时，每名角色都会从休息中恢复两倍正常HP，数值等于两倍体质调整值（最低 2）乘以角色等级。该效果不与基本餐食的大成功效果相叠加。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.Item.eaWmjDOIvUF9aDbq]

Enhance Campfire.name: 强化营火 Enhance Campfire
Enhance Campfire.text:
扎营期剩余时间里所有烹饪行动获得+1环境加值。PC升到11级之后，该加值变为+2。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.NFPQHxvpJd2vsKMe]

Set Traps.name: 设置陷阱 Set Traps
Set Traps.text:
如果营地在接下来的24小时内受到敌人的攻击，入侵者会在第一个战斗轮通过这些扰乱注意力的陷阱，使其所有攻击检定和技能检定受到-1的减值。任何先攻检定结果低于诺克诺克贼活DC 的敌人在第二个战斗轮中自己的回合开始之前也都会受到陷阱的影响。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.PSBOS7ZEl9RGWBqD]

Undead Guardians.name: 不死守卫 Undead Guardians
Undead Guardians.text:
如果营地在休息期间遭到攻击，这些魂魄会作为不死守卫保卫你和你的盟友。

不死守卫的形态为尖叫着的鬼魂。虽然它们的确切形状可由GM决定，但在战斗中的效果都是一致的。战斗中每一轮都可以让不死守卫保护一个 PC（使其AC获得+1状态加值持续1轮）或者让它们协助该PC攻击（使其一轮内的所有近战攻击获得+1状态加值）。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.KysTaC245mOnSnmE]

Water Hazards.name: 以水为障 Water Hazards
Water Hazards.text:
如果营地在接下来的24小时内遭到敌人的攻击，攻击者就必须应对意料之外的深水坑、水域中的暗流或是黏稠的泥沼，其先攻检定受到-2减值。队伍升到11级之后，该减值将变为-3。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.LN6mH7Muj4hgvStt]

Wilderness Survival.name: 野外生存 Wilderness Survival
Wilderness Survival.text:
任何人在扎营期间烹饪餐食或治疗疾病都会获得+1物品加值。如果队伍等级大于等于11，该加值变为+2。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.v9i9W49PeJ9NkfXX]

Prepare Campsite.name: 准备营地 Prepare Campsite
Prepare Campsite.text:
专注，听觉，探索，移动

你花费2小时搜索六角格，寻找一个适合扎营的安全地点，然后尝试一次生存检定来设立营地，DC为你所在地区的地区DC。

一旦营地准备完毕，你之后（但每24小时不能超过1次）在同一个六角格内再次准备营地时，你只需要花费1个小时，就可以自动取得之前已经取得的成功度结果。

大成功 你找到了扎营的完美地点。在接下来的24小时内，营地发生随机遭遇的纯骰DC增加2点。并且在第一个小时内执行扎营行动时，不会引发导致随机遭遇的纯骰检定。

成功 你找到了一个适合扎营和进行扎营行动的地点

失败 你的营地可以设立，但不是个好位置。需要进行检定的扎营行动有-2减值。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.Item.X1OvR5j1cAXZ4Lbp]

大失败 营地一片混乱。你可以用它进行休息和日常准备，但它太糟糕了，无法进行扎营行动。更糟糕的是，你试图扎营的行为引来了不必要的注意——尝试对该地区的遭遇DC进行纯骰检定。如果成功，将自动发生随机遭遇。

Cook Basic Meal.name: 烹饪基本餐食 Cook Basic Meal
Cook Basic Meal.text:
你花费 2 小时来准备一顿饭。你每准备一个人的餐食，就需要花费 2 个基础食材，外加 1 日份的口粮或1 份求生（Subsisting）获得的食物。

一旦队伍完成所有扎营行动，并且角色选择了他们想吃的餐食，尝试@Check[type:survival|dc:22]检定或@Check[type:cooking|dc:18]检定来确定基础餐食的效果。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-meal-effects.J5nci1DS7i1wDph4]

大成功 你准备了美味的一餐。食用餐食的角色在此次扎营期内，将在休息时恢复体质调整值×角色等级两倍的生命值，而非原本的数值。并且他的所有豁免有+1状态加值，直到他完成每日准备或开始冒险。

成功 你准备了一餐。食用者的所有豁免有+1状态加值，直到他完成每日准备或开始冒险。

失败 你准备的餐食能够果腹，但是没有其他效果。

大失败 你准备的餐食严重破坏了消化系统。吃下这顿饭的角色会陷入恶心1，直到他们经过完整的休息并完成日常准备。

Influence Companion.name: 影响伙伴 Influence Companion
Influence Companion.text:
专注， 听觉， 扎营

你试图获取NPC的好印象，或说服他支持你的目标。指定一个NPC，并进行技能检定来影响之。检定的DC以及成功的可能性，随该NPC的偏好而定（一般会记述在NPC的影响属性表中）。

大成功 你获得该NPC的2点影响力点数。

成功 你获得该NPC的1点影响力点数。

失败 你不获得该NPC的影响力点数。

大失败 你失去该NPC的1点影响力点数。

Discover Companion's Preferences.name: 刺探伙伴的偏好 Discover Companion's Preferences
Discover Companion's Preferences.text:
专注， 秘密， 扎营

你观察或研究NPC，试图发掘目标的偏好。指定1个NPC，并进行察觉检定或GM认为适当的技能检定来刺探之。检定的DC一般会记述在NPC的影响力数据块中。

大成功 从成功的选项中选择2个条目。你可选择同个条目2次，来获得2个同类的情报。

成功 从下列选项中选择1个条目：你发掘可用以影响该NPC的技能中，检定DC最低的1个项目(忽略已知的技能)；该NPC的1个成见；该NPC的1个抗力；该NPC的1个弱点。

失败 你不获得该NPC的任何情报。

大失败 如同成功一般选择1个条目，但获得错误的情报。例如误以为该NPC有抗力的吹捧为弱点。

Enhance Weapons.name: 打磨兵器 Enhance Weapons
Enhance Weapons.text:
每位PC选择一把近战武器。该近战武器在下次战斗中使用时，伤害骰获得+1环境加值。该加值一直持续到战斗结束或24小时后，二者以先发生的为准。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.ZKJlIqyFgbKDACnG]

Intimidating Posture.name: 威吓姿态 Intimidating Posture
Intimidating Posture.text: 营地散发的威吓信号会吓跑不太强大的遭遇。如果扎营期中的任何阶段发生了简单或微不足道的随机遭遇，则视为没有发生遭遇。当第二天醒来注意到被跳过的遭遇中敌人逃跑的迹象时，PC 仍然可以获得他们原本应该在战斗中击败他们而获得的所有XP。

Maintain Armor.name: 保养盔甲 Maintain Armor
Maintain Armor.text: 让一个PC选择一套盔甲或一个破损的盾牌。如果PC选择盔甲，那么在下一次穿戴此盔甲的遭遇中，该盔甲会给予穿戴者相当于其等级一半的临时生命值；这些临时生命值会在遭遇结束或24小时后失效。如果PC选择破损盾牌，瓦尔瑞会为破损盾牌恢复满HP。一旦队伍达到3级，就可以再有一名PC选择一套盔甲或破损盾牌，此后每2级都会额外再多一次。

Set Alarms.name: 设置警报 Set Alarms
Set Alarms.text:
在接下来的24小时里，营地第一次遭到敌人攻击时，警报会触发提醒PC。在这次攻击中，睡着角色的先攻检定无需承受-4状态减值，清醒的角色在先攻检定中获得+2环境加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-camping-effects.ptjs54eoEX8EAQNq]

Configure Regions.name: Configure Regions
Configure Regions.text:
1. Click on the 3 dots in the title bar and select Regions

  2. Set the appropriate region names

  3. If you are not using the official module, import the Random Encounters compendium and adjust combat tracks and roll tables

Populate Camping Actors.name: Populate Camping Actors
Populate Camping Actors.text: 1. Drag and Drop actors from the actors sidebar onto the plus tile in the camping actor list below the time tracker

Prepare Campsite.name: Prepare Campsite
Prepare Campsite.text: 1. Drop and Drag an actor from the actor list onto Prepare Campsite and roll it

Choose Recipes.name: Choose Recipes
Choose Recipes.text:
1. Drag and Drop actors from the actor list onto each recipe and roll it

  2. Favorite Meals are configured in the 3 dots menu in the title bar

  3. Each actor can subsist manually using a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-macros.Macro.0NhBWcZQf1GHp73f]{Subsist: Provisions} macro to add temporary Provision items to their inventory; those are consumed before rations

  4. The sidebar shows the total available rations and ingredients above the total consumed ingredients from unrolled recipes below.

Rest.name: Rest
Rest.text:
1. Click the Rest button to rest

  2. If your rest is interrupted, click it again to complete it

Read the full Documentation.name: Read the full Documentation
Read the full Documentation.text: 1. The full documentation can be viewed by clicking the 3 dots menu and choosing Help

Choose Camping Activities.text:
1. 从角色列表里拖出角色到行动上并骰检定

  2. 干得好！，电击>右侧的行动。
Choose Camping Activities.name: 选择扎营活动 Choose Camping Activities

Archaeological Find (Event +0).name: 考古发现（事件+0） Archaeological Find (Event +0)
Archaeological Find (Event +0).text:
有益，地块

位置 一个位于领土内但不在定居点影响范围内的地块，由GM选择。

事件 你听说在王国的偏远地区有一个保存完好的废墟，里面可能有这片土地的先民留下的历史文物。你可以派遣一队考古学家去调查。

王国技能 探索；领导 总督

大成功 该地点被证明是一个古老的凯立德定居点，远比塔尔多向内地的扩张要早得多。你的人民对这一发现感到高兴。减少[[/r 1d4]]点动荡，直到你的下个王国回合结束，所有基于文化和经济的检定有+2环境加值。如果你的任何定居点建有博物馆，你就可以展示来自这里的考古发现，进一步取悦你的人民。额外减少1点动荡。

成功 该地点被证明是塔尔多第二勘探军（Second Army of Exploration）遗留的营地。这个发现很有趣，但也不特别让人惊奇。减少2点动荡。

失败 该地点是一个相对比较新的村庄遗迹，因为强盗肆虐而被废弃。没有发现什么特别有趣的东西。

大失败 你再也没收到考古学家的消息。增加[[/r 1d4]]点动荡和1点衰退。你可以在任意王国回合的行动阶段再次尝试一次区域行动，再次尝试探索检定来重新调查该地点。但是因为调查已经被证明是危险的，因此DC增加2点。

Bandit Activity (Event +1).name: 强盗肆虐（事件+1） Bandit Activity (Event +1)
Bandit Activity (Event +1).text:
持续，有害

事件 强盗活动开始在你的王国兴起！

王国技能 防御；领导 卫队长

大成功 强盗被抓、被赶走或被击败。商人不用担心他们的货物了。减少[[/r 1d4]]点动荡。并且在下个王国回合期间，所有基于经济的检定有+1环境加值。

成功 强盗掠夺你人民的企图被阻止了，但他们依然存在。在下个王国回合开始时，你的资源骰减少1个。

失败 强盗掠夺商队和边远的仓库，商人变得更加谨慎和担忧。获得1点动荡，由你选择的一种毁灭增加1点。在下个王国回合开始时，你的资源骰减少4个。

大失败 强盗在你的领土横冲直撞，甚至开始入侵你的定居点。获得[[/r 1d4]]点动荡，由你选择的一种毁灭增加1点。在下个王国回合开始时，你的资源骰减少4个或减半，以更低的资源骰总数为准。

解决 你可以通过在检定中取得大成功来结束该持续事件。或者，如果PC急于寻找强盗，GM可以建立一个简短的支线任务，让PC在遭遇模式中剿灭他们。

Assassination Attempt (Event +1).name: 刺杀企图（事件+1） Assassination Attempt (Event +1)
Assassination Attempt (Event +1).text:
有害

事件 你的其中一位领导或杰出公民被刺客盯上了。由GM判断谁雇佣了这些刺客，然后尝试@Check[type:flat|dc:11|showDC:all]检定。如果成功，目标为分配领导职务的NPC。如果失败（或者没有NPC领导），则目标为王国中著名的NPC，最好是和PC建立友好关系的人。

王国技能 密谋；领导 卫队长

大成功 刺客被抓住、被赶走或企图被挫败，而没有危及他们的目标。目标NPC甚至可能没有意识到到自己处于危险，但你国家内的犯罪分子却不敢再轻举妄动。减少[[/r 1d4]]点动荡，并减少由你选择的一种毁灭1点。

成功 刺客接触到了目标，但在NPC受伤之前就被拿下了。

失败 刺客接触到了目标并下手，但因为被赶走或被击败导致刺杀失败。获得[[/r 1d4]]点动荡。如果NPC担任领导职务，在下个王国回合结束之前该领导职务将被移除。

大失败 刺客杀死NPC并逃走。如果NPC担任领导职务，该职务会空缺。获得[[/r 2d4]]点动荡和[[/r 1d4]]点衰退。

特殊：如果这个事件在王国战争期间发生，将事件的等级调整至+3。

Boomtown (Event +0).name: 城镇繁荣（事件+0） Boomtown (Event +0)
Boomtown (Event +0).text:
有益，定居点

位置 王国内最小的定居点

事件 你的一个定居点商贸繁荣，吸引许多人移居此处

王国技能 贸易；领导 司库

大成功 在你的下个回合开始，你获得4个奖励资源骰。在该回合的其余时间内，该定居点内所有建筑提供的物品加值翻倍；该加值能超过定居点的最大物品加值限制。

成功 在你的下个回合开始，你获得2个奖励资源骰。在该回合的其余时间内，该定居点内某个建筑（由PC指定）提供的物品加值翻倍；该加值能超过定居点的最大物品加值限制

失败 在你的下个回合开始，你获得1个奖励资源骰。

大失败 繁荣十分短暂，向泡沫一样破灭，许多商人因为没赶上而感到嫉妒和沮丧。在你的下个王国回合中，你减少2个资源骰。

特殊 繁荣会产生大量意想不到的浪费和垃圾。如果城镇繁荣事件发生在没有建造垃圾场的定居点，贸易检定的结果会降低一个成功度级别。

Building Demand (Event -1).name: 建筑需求（事件-1） Building Demand (Event -1)
Building Demand (Event -1).text:
持续，有害，定居点

位置 王国内最大的定居点

事件 受影响的定居点的公民要求建造或拆除特定建筑（二者概率各半）。如果市民要求建造新建筑，GM应选择尽可能接近王国等级的建筑，最好是建成后能减少动荡的建筑。如果市民们要求拆除建筑，GM应选择符合战役故事情节的建筑，最好是物品加值或其他奖励已经被更好的建筑淘汰的建筑。如果你同意在接下来的公民行动中让定居点建造或拆除指定建筑直到成功，你不需要为这个事件进行检定。

王国技能 政治；领导 总督

大成功 你说服市民放弃他们的要求。

成功 你暂时平息了市民的诉求，但他们对你的拒绝感到不满。增加1点动荡。

失败 市民继续坚持他们的要求，有些人用罢工来抗议。在你的下个王国回合开始时，获得1点动荡，并且减少2个资源骰。

大失败 类似失败，但是暴民的抗议还会增加1点衰退。

解决 如果事件检定大成功，或者成功建造或拆除指定建筑物，则结束此持续事件。

Crop Failure (Event +0).name: 作物歉收（事件+0） Crop Failure (Event +0)
Crop Failure (Event +0).text:
有害，地块

位置 由GM选择的一个农场地块。如果王国内没有农场地块，该事件没有效果。

事件 害虫、枯萎病或恶劣天气会损害作物的收成。

王国技能 农业；领导 司库

大成功 你在不花费王国资源的前提下挽回了作物歉收造成的损失。

成功 你控制了作物歉收，但它已经对你王国造成一定影响。在下个王国回合中，你王国的损耗增加1点。

失败 作物歉收摧毁了整片的农地。在下个王国回合中，王国损耗增加[[/r 1d4+1]]点。

大失败 类似失败，但作物歉收是如此具有毁灭性，导致农场地块被摧毁。

Cult Activity (Event +1).name: 邪教肆虐（事件+1） Cult Activity (Event +1)
Cult Activity (Event +1).text:
持续，有害，定居点

位置 由GM选择的随机定居点——在PC成功通过此事件的密谋检定之前，GM不应透露具体是哪个定居点，因为邪教藏身处的位置本身就是一个待解决的谜团！

事件 一个反对王国统治或已经存在已久的邪教组织开始绑架、蛊惑或献祭你的公民。该邪教隐藏在你国家内的某个定居点中，依托定居点中的某个隐藏神庙或安全屋进行秘密活动。你必须在每个王国回合尝试密谋检定来找到邪教所在的位置；然后每个王国回合尝试民俗检定，直到你捣毁邪教。

王国技能 密谋；领导 魔导师

大成功 你发现邪教总部在哪个定居点。当你尝试通过民俗检定来捣毁邪教时，DC减少5点。

成功 类似成功，但是不减少民俗检定的DC。由于邪教还在活动，增加1点动荡。

失败 你未能定位邪教总部。由于邪教还在活动，增加1点动荡。

大失败 类似失败，但增加[[/r 1d4]]点动荡，并增加1点腐化。

王国技能 民俗；领导 魔导师

大成功 邪教被彻底捣毁。减少[[/r 1d6]]点动荡，减少由你选择的一种毁灭1点。从邪教总部查抄[[/r 1d6]]奢侈品商品。

成功 邪教被赶出定居点但仍有余孽。选择下列奖励之一：减少[[/r 1d4]]点动荡，减少1点某种毁灭，或获得[[/r 1d4]]奢侈品商品。

失败 邪教依然存在并扩张了其邪恶计划。获得1点动荡并尝试1次@Check[type:flat|dc:6]检定，如果检定失败则增加1点腐化。

大失败 邪教变得更加明目张胆且具有破坏性。增加[[/r 1d4]]点动荡和1点腐化。

解决 发现邪教总部之后，为了结束这个持续事件，玩家必须通过成功的民俗检定来消灭邪教。或者GM可以为PC构建一个简短的支线冒险，让他们在遭遇模式中渗透进邪教总部并击败邪教。

特殊 如果此事件发生在具有下水道的定居点中，则在发现邪教总部的密谋检定上有-2减值。如果PC在第五章触发这个事件，则将事件的等级调整值提高到+3，并且该邪教一定和拉玛什图有关。

Diplomatic Overture (Event +0).name: 外交提议（事件+0） Diplomatic Overture (Event +0)
Diplomatic Overture (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 一个领国或团体向你的王国派遣使节。发出提议的团体从谈判DC边栏中随机选择（详见“王国技能”一节）。如果王国和该团体已经建立外交关系，则事件会继续进行下面的权术检定。如果王国尚未和该组织建立外交关系，则此事件可以让王国有机会立即尝试一次派遣外交使节领导行动。

王国技能 权术；领导 特使

大成功 外交会谈难以置信地成功，你可以选择获得以下好处中的两种：获得5个由你选择的商品、在下个回合开始时获得 2个额外资源骰、或者你和该团体自动建立贸易协定。

成功 类似成功，但只能选择一种好处。

失败 双方进行了亲切的会谈，并交换了意见。

大失败 外交会谈非常糟糕。除非你使用的5个由你选择的商品或10RP来贿赂该团体，否则他们会和你断绝外交关系。你可以在之后正常通过派遣外交使节行动来重建外交关系，但有-2环境减值。

Discovery (Event +0).name: Discovery (Event +0)
Discovery (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 Scholars unearth a bit of ancient lore or devise important new research of their own.

王国技能 Scholarship; 领导 Counselor

大成功 Your discovery brings glory and a boon to your resources! At the start of your next Kingdom turn，gain 1 Fame or Infamy point (as appropriate) and gain 6 bonus Resource Dice. Your people are amazed. Reduce Unrest by 2.

成功 Your discovery is a helpful (but not overly amazing) boon to your kingdom’s resources. On your next turn，gain 3 bonus Resource Dice.

失败 Your discovery is of some academic interest but ultimately of limited use. Gain 1 bonus Resource Die at the start of your next turn.

大失败 Your discovery turns out to be a dead end and a wasteful boondoggle. Reduce your total Resource Dice by 2 next turn.

Drug Den (Event +1).name: Drug Den (Event +1)
Drug Den (Event +1).text:
持续，有害，定居点

位置 The largest settlement in the kingdom; the GM secretly selects one of the Residential lots to house a drug den.

事件 One of the Residential lots in your settlement has become an illicit hive for trading harmful and addictive drugs，and as long as it continues to operate，it could bring ruin to your entire kingdom.

王国技能 密谋；领导 Counselor

大成功 You uncover and stop the drug ring before it causes a lot of damage，bringing counseling to those who may need it.

成功 You work to minimize the damage done by the illicit drug trade，but the activity continues. Gain 1 Unrest.

失败 Drug dealers continue to spread their influence. Addiction increases and harms productivity，and drug-related crime grows. Increase Unrest，Crime，and Decay by 1 each.

大失败 Your attempt is a total failure. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and increase Crime and Decay (one score by 1，the other score by 2). In addition，the Residential lot that the drug den was located in is reduced to Rubble. The drug den then moves to another lot chosen by the GM (see Location，above).

解决 A critical success on the check ends this continuous event. Optionally，the GM can instead build a short adventure for the PCs to infiltrate the drug den and defeat the criminals in encounter mode.

Economic Surge (Event +2).name: Economic Surge (Event +2)
Economic Surge (Event +2).text:
有益，持续

事件 Trade and productivity have been booming throughout your kingdom.

王国技能 贸易；领导 司库

大成功 A trade bonanza brings unexpected profits. Gain 2 bonus Resource Dice at the start of your next Kingdom turn.

成功 As critical success but you gain only 1 bonus Resource Die at the start of your next Kingdom turn.

失败 The economic surge slows for a bit; if you failed at this check on your previous Kingdom turn，the Economic Surge event ends.

大失败 The economic surge comes to an end.

解决 This continuous event ends following either a critical failure or two consecutive failures on the check.

Expansion Demand (Event +0).name: Expansion Demand (Event +0)
Expansion Demand (Event +0).text:
持续，有害

事件 The citizens of your kingdom want expansion! If you successfully Claimed a Hex this turn，the result of your check for this event is improved one degree.

王国技能 Exploration; 领导 卫队长

大成功 Your citizens are pleased with the growth of the kingdom.

成功 You satisfy the citizens’ demands for growth，but if you don’t successfully Claim a Hex during your next Kingdom turn，increase Unrest by 1.

失败 Your citizens remain unhappy with your kingdom’s growth. Increase Unrest by 1. If you don’t successfully Claim a hex during your next Kingdom turn，increase Unrest by 1 again.

大失败 As failure，but increase the Unrest by 2.

解决 Achieve either a success or critical success at this event.

Festive Invitiation (Event +0).name: Festive Invitiation (Event +0)
Festive Invitiation (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 Your kingdom’s leaders are invited to a festival in a region in which the kingdom has established diplomatic relations. The GM chooses an existing diplomatic ally to send the invitation and should customize the details of that event to match that ally; if your kingdom has no diplomatic relations，this event has no effect. When your leaders attend the festival，you can bring up to 4 Resource Dice as “gifts” to the festival; reduce the number of Resource Dice you roll on the next Kingdom turn by this amount

王国技能 Arts; 领导 Ruler

大成功 You entertain and delight your host and bolster your alliance with their people，and they gratefully reciprocate your gifts. For each Resource Die you brought as a gift，choose a type of Commodity. Then roll the die; you gain that amount of that Commodity. Attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11]. If you are successful，your ally extends a Diplomatic Overture or a Visiting Celebrity event (equal chance of either) during the Event phase of your next Kingdom turn (in addition to any other event that would occur).

成功 The festival is a delight. If you brought Resource Dice as gifts，choose a Commodity. You gain an amount of that Commodity equal to the number of Resource Dice you brought as gifts.

失败 The festival was entertaining enough，but if you brought Resource Dice as gifts，they’re not reciprocated.

大失败 One of your leaders committed a faux pas during the festival，and the celebration ends prematurely. Attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11]. If you fail，your host cuts ties with your kingdom; gain 1 Unrest. (In the future，you may attempt to reestablish diplomatic relations in the usual way.)

Food Shortage (Event +1).name: Food Shortage (Event +1)
Food Shortage (Event +1).text:
有害

事件 Spoilage，treachery，or bad luck has caused a food shortage this turn.

王国技能 农业；领导 司库

大成功 Through careful rationing，you manage to get through the shortage without harm.

成功 Your shortages are manageable，with some workers going hungry. Your kingdom’s Consumption is increased by 1 at the start of the next turn. Attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:6]. On a failure，this event reoccurs next turn (in addition to any other event that would occur).

失败 The shortages are severe. Your kingdom’s Consumption is increased by 1 per settlement at the start of the next turn. Attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:16]. On a failure，this event reoccurs next turn (in addition to any other event that would occur).

大失败 The shortages are catastrophic. Increase Unrest by 2 and Strife by 1，and your kingdom’s Consumption is increased by 1 per settlement at the start of the next turn. This event reoccurs next turn (in addition to any other event that would occur).

Food Surplus (Event +0).name: Food Surplus (Event +0)
Food Surplus (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 Local crops thrive，hunters do very well，or livestock numbers are greater than expected. If this event occurs，it immediately ends any ongoing food shortage event.

王国技能 农业；领导 司库

大成功 Your bumper crops include wild harvests that allow you to skip the entire Pay Consumption step of the Upkeep phase of your next Kingdom turn. Gain [[/r 1d6]] Food Commodities.

成功 Your excess crops lead to increased supplies. Treat your Consumption during the next Kingdom turn as 2 lower than its actual score and gain [[/r 1d6]] Food Commodities.

失败 The food surplus isn’t as huge as you’d expected. Treat your Consumption during the next turn as 1 lower than its actual score.

大失败 What you thought was an excess of food is infested with spoilage，ergot，or other contamination. Increase Unrest by 1 and one Ruin of your choice by1.

Good Weather (Event +1).name: Good Weather (Event +1)
Good Weather (Event +1).text:
Benficial，Fortune

事件 Good weather raises spirits among citizens.

王国技能 Wilderness; 领导 魔导师

大成功 The glorious climate puts everyone in an excellent mood. Reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d6]]，and once during your next Kingdom turn when you attempt an Agriculture，Boating，Exploration，or Wilderness check，you can roll twice and take the better result.

成功 Extended good weather makes life pleasant and easy. Reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d4]].

失败 Good weather produces a short but pleasant respite. Reduce Unrest by 1.

大失败 The good weather doesn’t last long enough to help.

Land Rush (Event +1).name: Land Rush (Event +1)
Land Rush (Event +1).text:
有害，地块

位置 An unclaimed hex adjacent to your kingdom’s border

事件 Overeager settlers attempt to construct Farmland or a Work Site (as chosen by the GM) at their own expense in the wilderness，and they begin squabbling over the site’s ownership.

王国技能 政治；领导 总督

大成功 You mediate the conflict among the settlers，and in thanks，they agree to join your kingdom. You automatically claim the Hex，gaining 10 kingdom XP (page 540) and increasing your kingdom’s Size by 1 (this affects all statistics determined by Size; see page 532). You immediately gain the benefits of the Farmland or Work Site the settlers built. Decrease Unrest by 1.

成功 You mediate the conflict among the settlers，and they agree to join your kingdom if you pay them 4 Resource Dice of RP. If you do so，treat this as a critical success. If you refuse，treat this as a Failure.

失败 The settlers refuse any overture to join your kingdom and their bickering continues，ultimately resulting in the destruction of their hard work and many deaths. Your kingdom isn’t significantly impacted，but your failure to handle the situation generates unease. Increase Unrest by 1.

大失败 As failure，but the fighting spills over into your kingdom before it resolves itself. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and two Ruins of your choice by 1.

Local Disaster (Event +0).name: Local Disaster (Event +0)
Local Disaster (Event +0).text:
有害，定居点

位置 A randomly determined settlement Event A disaster strikes the settlement，be it fire，flooding，earthquakes，an architectural failure，or the like.

王国技能 Industry; 领导 魔导师

大成功 You prepared well for the disaster and the settlement survives intact and undamaged.

成功 The settlement still functions despite the loss of some resources. During the next turn，reduce your Resource Dice total by 2.

失败 Several lots in the settlement are torn up，including at least one structure. Gain 1 Decay and place rubble into three lots of the PCs’ choice in the settlement’s Urban Grid. During the next turn，reduce your Resource Dice total by 4.

大失败 Destruction is widespread. Roll [[/r 1d6]] and gain that number of points of Decay. Then select an equal number of adjacent blocks in your settlement and place rubble into one lot of your choice within each selected block. If a structure is in that lot，it’s reduced to rubble. During the next turn，reduce your Resource Dice total by 6.

特殊 If this event occurs in a settlement with a cemetery，fewer resources are needed to properly honor those who die during the event. Halve all Resource Dice reductions created by this event.

Monster Activity (Event +0).name: Monster Activity (Event +0)
Monster Activity (Event +0).text:
持续，有害，地块

位置 A claimed hex chosen by the GM that isn’t in the influence of a settlement

事件 A monster，or even an entire group of monsters attacks the kingdom! Determine the encounter by rolling on the random encounter table that is the same level as the kingdom’s level. If the kingdom is 20th level，roll on the next highest zone and apply the elite adjustments (Pathfinder Bestiary 6) to the creatures.

王国技能 防御；领导 Ruler

大成功 The monsters are slain or driven off without harm to your kingdom. Even better，an unexpected claim of treasure gained from the monster lair grants [[/r 1d4]] Luxuries and 2 bonus Resource Dice on the next turn.

成功 The monsters attack some of your citizens but are driven off before they do too much damage. The threat persists，and while fear continues to slowly spread，your kingdom suffers no physical damage at this time. Increase Unrest by 1.

失败 The monsters’ rampage terrorizes the countryside and results in frightening rumors even in the heart of the kingdom’s safest cities. The closest Farmland or Work Site to the monster’s hex is destroyed. Gain [[/r 1d4]] Unrest and 1 Decay.

大失败 As failure，but the monsters’ assaults spread into the settlement closest to the monster’s hex，spreading the danger they represent more and more through your kingdom. If any of your settlement’s borders aren’t protected by water or a wall，or if the monster can fly or swim (as appropriate) across any of your protective borders，the monster enters the settlement and one structure chosen by the players is reduced to rubble. Gain [[/r 1d4]] Unrest and 2 Decay. Otherwise，the monsters’ ability to harm the settlement is hampered by your defenses. Gain 1 Unrest and one of the settlement’s walls is destroyed; uncheck it on your Urban Grid.

解决 This event continues until you achieve a critical success on the check or until the PCs step in to track down and defeat the monster(s) themselves.

Natural Disaster (Event +2).name: Natural Disaster (Event +2)
Natural Disaster (Event +2).text:
有害

事件 A natural cataclysm such as a wildfire，devastating weather，earthquake，or flood (as determined by the GM) devastates your kingdom. While in a worst-case scenario the disaster’s immediate and most destructive effects affect a single settlement，many of its effects are larger in scope and can affect the entire kingdom.

王国技能 Wilderness; 领导 魔导师

大成功 You prepared well for the disaster. While disruptive，the damage is minimized.

成功 Your quick response keeps your people safe and allows you to recover quickly. During the next turn，reduce your Resource Dice total by 4.

失败 The disaster causes severe damage. Choose one claimed hex in which you have a Farmland or Work Site; that feature is destroyed. Gain 1 Decay and [[/r 1d6]] Unrest. During the next turn，reduce your Resource Dice total by 6.

大失败 Multiple hexes are totally devastated. Choose [[/r 1d6]] claimed hexes in which you have Farmlands or Work Sites; those features are destroyed. Gain 1 Decay for each hex affected，and gain [[/r 2d6]] Unrest. In addition，one settlement of your choice is particularly hard hit; that settlement immediately suffers the effects of a Local Disaster (page 560). During the next turn，reduce your Resource Dice total by 8.

Nature's Blessing (Event +0).name: Nature's Blessing (Event +0)
Nature's Blessing (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 A natural event，such as a bloom of rare wildflowers in a previously empty field，a glorious omen in the night sky like the northern lights，or the return to prominence of a previously rare type of wildlife raises your kingdom’s morale and inspires its creators.

王国技能 Arts; 领导 魔导师

大成功 The glow of the blessing brings lasting delight. During your next turn，the results of checks to Craft Luxuries or Create a Masterpiece are improved one degree. Decrease Unrest by [[/r 1d6]].

Success Your blessing touches the hearts of all. You gain a +1 status bonus to Culture- and Stability-based checks on your next Kingdom turn.

失败 The blessing inspires some of your people but not all of them.

大失败 Arguments over the meaning of the blessing taint people’s goodwill. Increase Unrest by 1.

New Subjects (Event +0).name: New Subjects (Event +0)
New Subjects (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 A small group of intelligent creatures joins your kingdom and submits to your rule，bringing along their knowledge of hidden places within your kingdom. (The exact nature and ancestry of these new subjects is determined by the GM.)

王国技能 权术；领导 特使

大成功 Your subjects blend in seamlessly and are welcomed by your citizens，while bringing their own unique contributions to your kingdom. You gain 6 bonus Resource Dice at the start of the next Kingdom turn，and you gain an additional Region activity during the Activity phase of the next Kingdom turn.

成功 Your new subjects are welcomed，and their contributions help in the short term. Gain 3 bonus Resource Dice next turn.

失败 Your new subjects endure discrimination from intolerant citizens in your kingdom，but they nonetheless bring willing hands to work and such resources as they possess. Increase Unrest by 1 but gain 1 bonus Resource Die next turn.

大失败 Your new subjects encounter discrimination and xenophobia，and they are eventually driven back into the wild. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and Strife by 1.

Noblesse Oblige (Event +0).name: Noblesse Oblige (Event +0)
Noblesse Oblige (Event +0).text:
Benficial，定居点

位置 A settlement that includes at least one mansion or noble villa. If there are no settlements in the kingdom with these structures，this event doesn’t occur.

事件 A noble family or wealthy benefactor offers to build an improvement to beautify the settlement.

王国技能 Arts; 领导 总督

大成功 The nobles build a monument and a park in lots of the players’ choice at no expense to the kingdom (the Build Structure activity is not required).

成功 The nobles pay the RP and Commodity cost of either a monument or a park，provided the party uses the Civic activity granted by this settlement in the next Kingdom turn to Build the Structure. The Build Structure check automatically succeeds.

失败 Although the nobles had good intentions，bickering among individual aristocrats ultimately prevents the project from ever taking place.

大失败 As failure，but the bickering persists. Gain 1 Unrest and attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11]. On a failure，your kingdom suffers a Feud event on the next turn’s Event phase (in addition to any other event).

Outstanding Success (Event +0).name: Outstanding Success (Event +0)
Outstanding Success (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 One of your kingdom’s citizens brings glory to the kingdom，be it through an artistic masterpiece，an architectural marvel，a grand voyage of discovery，a landmark academic treatise，a new magical theory，or a similar discovery，as decided upon by the party.

王国技能 Arts; 领导 Counselor

大成功 The citizen’s success is truly legendary. Gain 3 bonus Resource Dice on your next turn.

成功 This success brings fame and fortune to your kingdom. Gain 1 bonus Resource Die on your next turn.

失败 The success inspires imitators and rapidly loses its specialness，but you suffer no jealousy-driven backlash.

大失败 Scandal! Either the artist’s sinister motives are exposed by their sudden fame，competitors work to undermine them，or the public simply refuses to accept the success. Increase Unrest by 1 and Corruption by 1.

Pilgrimage (Event +1).name: Pilgrimage (Event +1)
Pilgrimage (Event +1).text:
Benficial

事件 A large number of pilgrims flock to your settlements to celebrate their high holy days or to bask in your kingdom’s faith. If your kingdom does not have at least one shrine，temple，or cathedral，this event does not occur.

王国技能 民俗；领导 魔导师

大成功 Pilgrims visit all of your settlements to engage in acts of worship. Not only do they provide their own food and supplies，but they also bring gifts to your shrines，temples，and cathedrals. Gain [[/r 1d6]] Luxuries，reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d6]]，and reduce one Ruin of your choice by 1.

成功 The pilgrims celebrate their holy days at your settlements，and their good cheer and attitudes prove infectious. Reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d4]].

失败 As success，but the pilgrims put a strain on your kingdom’s resources. Increase Consumption by [[/r 1d4]] on the next turn.

大失败 The pilgrims hold their festivals，but their devout displays by a few strident zealots who stay behind stir up controversy with locals of other faiths. Increase Corruption by 1 and increase Consumption by [[/r 1d4]] on the next turn.

Plague (Event +1).name: Plague (Event +1)
Plague (Event +1).text:
持续，有害，定居点

位置 The largest settlement in the kingdom

王国技能 防御；领导 Ruler

事件 A deadly sickness strikes one of your settlements. You take a –2 status penalty to all Civic activities made in a settlement suffering from a plague unless the settlement has a sewer system.

大成功 You halt the spread of the plague and are able to cure it，but even so，the plague’s effects reduce your Resource Dice on the next turn by 2.

成功 The plague continues! Gain [[/r 1d4]] Unrest and increase one of your Ruins by 1.

失败 The plague spreads and claims more victims. Gain [[/r 1d6]] Unrest and increase all of your Ruins by 1.

大失败 As failure，but the plague spreads to the nearest unaffected settlement in your kingdom. Treat additional plagues in different settlements as separate continuous Plague events.

解决 This Plague event ends if you achieve a critical success on the check or after you achieve a total of 4 successes with the Provide Care activity (a critical success with Provide Care counts as 2 successes in this case).

特殊 If the plague strikes a settlement that has no dumps，filth in the streets allows the disease to spread more easily. You take a –4 item penalty to checks to resolve this event. On the other hand，if a plague-stricken settlement has a sewer system，the increased sanitation provides a +2 item bonus to checks to resolve this event.

Political Calm (Event -1).name: Political Calm (Event -1)
Political Calm (Event -1).text:
有益

事件 A sudden absence of political machinations and distracting intrigue coincides with a rise in public approval for its leaders.

王国技能 政治；领导 Ruler

大成功 You capitalize upon the public approval with efficiency and speed. Reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d6]] or reduce one Ruin of your choice by 1. Gain a +2 status bonus to all checks made to resolve events during your next Kingdom turn.

成功 Loyalty is up across the board. Reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d4]].

失败 The calm is a refreshing change，but people sense it cannot last. Reduce Unrest by 1.

大失败 The calm simply hides deeper plotting simmering in the shadows. Increase one Ruin by 1.

Public Scandal (Event +0).name: Public Scandal (Event +0)
Public Scandal (Event +0).text:
有害

事件 One of your NPC leaders is implicated in a crime or an embarrassing situation. If you have no NPC leaders，this event involves a PC leader only if the GM determines that the PC leader has been acting in a way that could cause a scandal; otherwise this event does not occur.

王国技能 密谋；领导 Counselor

大成功 You quiet the scandal before it spawns more than rumors.

成功 Word gets out，but an apology and careful words manage to blunt the outrage. Gain 1 Unrest.

失败 The people are very unhappy with their leader’s behavior. Gain [[/r 1d4]] Unrest and increase Corruption by 1.

大失败 The people are outraged by the scandal and demand the leader be replaced. Gain [[/r 1d6]] Unrest and increase a Ruin of your choice by 1. Then immediately use the New Leadership kingdom activity (page 520) to attempt to replace the leader. If you fail，this event occurs again with the same leadership role on the kingdom’s next Event phase. If the leader involved in the scandal takes any leadership role during the next [[/r 1d4]] Kingdom turns，this event occurs again with that character at the focus of the scandal.

Remarkable Treasure (Event +2).name: Remarkable Treasure (Event +2)
Remarkable Treasure (Event +2).text:
有益，Fortune

事件 Adventurers from outside of your kingdom discover a cache of rare and unusual treasures while exploring wilderness claimed by your nation.

王国技能 Exploration; 领导 特使

大成功 The adventurers are only too eager to share their discoveries with the kingdom. The treasures buoy the local economy and spawn a rush of prospectors out looking for their own treasures. Gain [[/r 1d6]] Luxuries and decrease Unrest by [[/r 1d4]]. Gain one Fame or Infamy point (as appropriate) at the start of the next Kingdom turn. If you Hire Adventurers during your next Kingdom turn，roll twice for the skill check and take the better result.

成功 The adventurers agree to share their discoveries with the kingdom. Gain [[/r 1d4]] Luxuries and decrease Unrest by [[/r 1d4]].

失败 The adventurers aren’t particularly eager to share their discoveries，but the excitement of the news still helps delight the populace. Reduce Unrest by 1.

大失败 The adventurers are particularly hostile or even disrespectful toward your kingdom and its citizens. Your citizens see them less as heroes and more as bandits plundering the nation’s resources，or even outright villains. Whether this perception is right or not，the damage is done. Gain 1 Unrest. The GM should consider building up these adventurers as recurring antagonists in future events.

Sensational Crime (Event +1).name: Sensational Crime (Event +1)
Sensational Crime (Event +1).text:
持续，有害，定居点

位置 A randomly determined settlement in the kingdom Event A notorious serial killer，deadly arsonist，flamboyant jewel thief，or otherwise sensational criminal plagues your kingdom.

王国技能 密谋；领导 卫队长

大成功 The criminal has been caught and the one-person crime wave ends. Reduce Crime by 2，and reduce one other Ruin of your choice by 2. In addition，if you achieve this level of success on the turn this event begins，the criminal was caught in the act of perpetrating their first crime but prevented from completing it; in this case，you discourage future criminals—reduce Crime by 1.

成功 You foil the criminal’s current plans and perhaps arrest some accomplices，but the mastermind gets away to plot future crimes. Increase Unrest by 1.

失败 The criminal succeeds in their crime and escapes justice. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and Crime by 1.

大失败 As failure，but the criminal also makes fools out of law enforcement，frames an innocent for the crime，or taunts the authorities for their failure. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d6]]，Crime by 2，and one other Ruin of your choice by 2.

解决 This continuous event ends when you achieve a critical success on the check. Alternately，the GM could create a short adventure to allow the PCs to step in，track down，and confront the criminal to end the event.

Unexpected Find (Event +0).name: Unexpected Find (Event +0)
Unexpected Find (Event +0).text:
Benficial，定居点

位置 The kingdom’s newest settlement

事件 Local citizens discover a forgotten magic item while working on a construction site or while clearing out an old storage area.

王国技能 贸易；领导 Ruler

大成功 The citizens donate the magic item to the PCs as thanks. The item is either a permanent item or four consumable items (equal chance of each) of a level equal to your kingdom. The exact item discovered is determined by the GM. If the PCs decide to donate the discovery to the community，reduce Unrest by [[/r 2d4]].

成功 The magic treasure is donated to the community; reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d4]].

失败 The found item is grudgingly donated to the community; reduce Unrest by 1.

大失败 The recovered item is stolen before it can be donated，found to be cursed，or turns out to be worthless junk. Increase Unrest by 1.

Vandals (Event +1).name: Vandals (Event +1)
Vandals (Event +1).text:
持续，有害，定居点

位置 A randomly determined settlement

事件 Vandals，troublemakers，and dissidents destroy property in your settlement.

王国技能 Industry; 领导 卫队长

大成功 You root out the vandals and stop them from causing any damage.

成功 The vandals are caught in the act of damaging an area in your settlement. The event ends，but on the next turn，the damage done reduces your Resource Dice by 2.

失败 The vandals damage and deface several minor structures in the settlement and remain uncaught for now. Fortunately，the damage done can be easily repaired，but you start the next turn with 4 fewer Resource Dice.

大失败 The vandals also manage to reduce one structure (chosen by the players) to rubble. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and reduce your Resource Dice next turn by 4.

解决 This event ends when you succeed at the check.

Visiting Celebrity (Event +1).name: Visiting Celebrity (Event +1)
Visiting Celebrity (Event +1).text:
有益，定居点

位置 A randomly determined settlement

事件 A celebrity from another nation or even a distant land visits one of your settlements，causing a sudden influx of notoriety，visitors，and lavish spending. The GM determines the nature of the visiting celebrity.

王国技能 Arts; 领导 特使

大成功 The visit is a rousing success. Not only are your citizens delighted by the visitor，but the visitor is quite taken with your kingdom and leaves you with a parting gift. Choose two of the following: gain 4 bonus Resource Dice next turn，gain [[/r 1d6]] Luxury commodities，or reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d6]].

成功 The visit is a success，and the celebrity enjoys their time in your kingdom. Choose one of the parting gifts from those listed in the critical success result.

失败 The visitor has an agreeable if pedestrian visit. Reduce Unrest by 1.

大失败 The visitor leaves unimpressed and spreads reports of their unpleasant visit abroad. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]]. The next time your kingdom has a Visiting Celebrity，increase that event’s level modifier by 2.

Wealthy Immigrant (Event +2).name: Wealthy Immigrant (Event +2)
Wealthy Immigrant (Event +2).text:
有益，持续，定居点

位置 The kingdom’s capital Event A rich merchant or prominent noble from another land is impressed with your kingdom and asks to construct an estate in your kingdom’s capital. If you give permission，proceed with this event. If you deny the request，this event doesn’t occur; the next time you have a Wealthy Immigrant event，increase the event’s level modifier by 1.

王国技能 Industry; 领导 特使

大成功 The immigrant constructs a noble villa，free of charge and without you having to Build the Structure in an available spot in the capital. If there isn’t enough room in the capital，the immigrant builds in the largest settlement that has enough room.

成功 As critical success，except the immigrant instead constructs a mansion.

失败 The immigrant isn’t quite sure where they want to build，but they continue looking.

大失败 After sending representatives，the immigrant decides not to build a home in your settlement after all，disappointing the local aristocracy. Increase Unrest by 1.

解决 Achieve a success，critical success，or critical failure against this event.

Monster Hunt (Event +0).name: Monster Hunt (Event +0)
Monster Hunt (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 This event takes place at the end of the next Kingdom turn，as numerous eager adventurers join together and scour the wilderness for another monster trophy to add to the tavern’s growing collection.

Kingdom Skill Wilderness; 领导 卫队长

大成功 The eager monster hunters confront and defeat a Huge (or larger) monster in the wilderness. The GM can determine the exact type of monster hunted down (but it shouldn’t be a specific creature still awaiting discovery by the PCs in a hex encounter). Trophies from the monster are put on display in a tavern or other public building in the capital city. Gain one additional Fame or Infamy point (as appropriate) at the start of the next Kingdom turn and reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d6]].

成功 As critical success，but the monster hunters track down and slay a Large monster in the wilderness. Reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d4]].

失败 The monster hunters fail in their attempt to hunt a creature，but the kingdom was，if only for a short while，distracted by the attempt. Reduce Unrest by 1. Critical Failure The monster hunters confront a Huge (or larger) monster but fail to defeat it. Worse，the monster follows the surviving hunters back home and attacks the kingdom’s capital city! Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and one Ruin of the players’ choice by 1. The monster then retreats to the wilderness，but it continues to be a danger. A Monster Activity event automatically takes place during the next Kingdom turn as this creature continues to threaten the region.

Barbarian Immigrants (Event +2).name: Barbarian Immigrants (Event +2)
Barbarian Immigrants (Event +2).text:
有益

事件 Once the PCs defeat the barbarians，they scatter back into the surrounding wilderness，but some of them are drawn by your reputation and look to join the PCs’ kingdom. This event occurs during the first Kingdom turn after the barbarians defeat.

Kingdom Skill 权术；领导 卫队长

大成功 A large number of barbarians are welcomed into several settlements. Their presence helps to bolster a sense of security (decrease Unrest by [[/r 1d6]])，and also helps to curtail bandit and monster activity. From this point on，kingdom checks made to resolve the following random events gain a +2 circumstance bonus: Bandit Activity，Monster Activity，and Undead Uprising.

成功 As critical success，but decrease Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and the circumstance bonus is only +1.

失败 The integration of the barbarians into the kingdom is a bit rougher than expected and doesn’t provide additional defense against events. Reduce Unrest by 1.

大失败 The barbarians and citizens clash violently. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and one Ruin of the players’ choice by 1; the barbarians then scatter back into the wilderness.

The Local Paper (Event +0).name: The Local Paper (Event +0)
The Local Paper (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 This event takes place on the one Kingdom Turn after the turn during which the PCs build their first printing house. Access to the printing press allows for the production of an initially modest weekly flyer that gathers news and presents stories of interest. Over time，this flyer grows in size，potentially becoming something akin to a local newspaper，but only if your printing house can keep up with the demand. While it doesn’t directly impact the effects of this event，you should encourage your players to come up with a fun name for their kingdom’s paper.

王国技能 Industry; 领导 Counselor

大成功 You gain access to the Read All About It leadership activity. More importantly，your industrious editors prove to be more than up to the task of keeping the presses running，and the people of the kingdom take to the new paper with delight. Reduce unrest by [[/r 1d4]]，and at the start of your next Kingdom Turn，you gain one additional Fame or Infamy point.

成功 You gain access to the Read All About It leadership activity，and while your people enjoy the paper，it’s always a grind to hit your deadlines. Reduce Unrest by 1.

失败 You gain access to the Read All About It leadership activity，but the stress of hitting deadlines puts a strain on your editors. Increase Unrest by 1.

大失败 You fail to get the local paper off the ground，and your frustrated editors spread word of how you mismanaged the affair. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and Strife by 1.

Special Edition (Event +0).name: Special Edition (Event +0)
Special Edition (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 A famous writer approaches your printing house with an offer to produce a special，limited edition of one of their previously published works，or a brand new edition of a previously unpublished story. This event can occur multiple times at the GM’s discretion，but never more than twice a game year.

王国技能 Arts; 领导 Counselor

大成功 The special edition proves to be a rousing success! At the start of your next Kingdom Turn，you gain two bonus Resource Dice and [[/r 1d4]] Luxury commodities.

成功 The special edition is popular but takes a while to sell out. At the start of your next Kingdom Turn，you gain one bonus Resource Die.

失败 The special edition fails to connect with any readers and provides no significant benefit to your nation as a result.

大失败 The special edition is controversial in some way and incites anger in a key portion of your population. Increase one Ruin of your choice by 1.

Goblin Backlash (Event -2).name: Goblin Backlash (Event -2)
Goblin Backlash (Event -2).text:
持续，有害

事件 Your citizens doubt your wisdom in appointing a goblin and worry that his unsavory personality traits might cause issues for the kingdom overall. If the goblin companion is still chaotic evil，you take a –2 circumstance penalty in resolving this event.

Kingdom Skill 政治；领导 Ruler

大成功 You convince the citizens that the goblin will do well，and use his appointment to prove that you are seeking to build a diverse kingdom where anyone can find a role in shaping its destiny. The event ends，and your citizens grow more accepting of all people. Word of your kingdom’s acceptance of normally shunned elements of society spreads，and from this point on，you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all New Leadership，Quell Unrest，and Pledge of Fealty checks.

成功 You prevent the unrest from growing，but the citizens continue to grumble and grouse about the goblin into the next kingdom turn.

失败 The people rise up，with protests and even a few riots taking place as concerned citizens fan the flames of dissent in the kingdom. Gain 1 Unrest.

大失败 As failure，but gain [[/r 1d4]] Unrest. In addition，an Assassination Attempt event takes place immediately after resolving this event，with the goblin as the target. The assassin itself should be a non-good，previously unnamed NPC citizen in the PC’s kingdom. They weren’t hired by anyone，instead acting on their own to remove a perceived threat (the goblin) to the kingdom’s well-being.

解决 You can end this continuous event with a critical success on the check. Alternately，if the PCs remove the goblin from his leadership position (including if he’s killed)，the event ends. If the PCs do this though，and then attempt to install the goblin as a leader at a later date，this event occurs again but its level is increased by 1.

Too Close to Home (Event +1).name: Too Close to Home (Event +1)
Too Close to Home (Event +1).text:
Dangerous，Hex

位置 A hex of the GM’s choosing within the influence of the settlement that’s closest to the PCs’ current location.

事件 A monster blooms from a citizen and begins to rampage the area. The type of monster should be chosen by the GM; its level should equal the party’s level + 1 (a Low threat encounter). The PCs can choose to resolve this event with a Kingdom skill check，or they can travel to the hex the monster is rampaging in to challenge it in encounter mode. If they don’t defeat the monster by the end of the next day，treat this event as having a Critical Failure result.

Kingdom Skill 防御；领导 卫队长

大成功 The monster is defeated before any more lives are lost.

成功 The monster is defeated but may have slain some citizens. Attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11|showDC:all]. On a failure，a few locals were slain; increase Unrest by 1.

失败 The monster slays several citizens before it is defeated. Increase Unrest by 1.

大失败 The monster continues to rampage unopposed. This event becomes Continuous and occurs every day until the monster is defeated; additional Cult events still occur as normal. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and Decay by 1.

Public Outburst (Event +0).name: Public Outburst (Event +0)
Public Outburst (Event +0).text:
有害

事件 The citizens of the kingdom grow particularly nervous and fearful about the spread of monster attacks，with more reports of monsters bursting out of random victims. Each time this event occurs，increase the event’s level modifier by 1 to a maximum of +2，at which point the curse has become the populace’s greatest fear. The PCs must work to calm the nation and convince the people that they are doing everything they can to stop this supernatural affliction.

Kingdom Skill 政治；领导 Ruler

大成功 The citizens are comforted by promises. This occurrence of Public Outburst does not increase the level modifier of the next occurrence.

成功 The citizens are somewhat comforted，and you prevent Unrest from rising.

失败 Rumors that the affliction might be beyond the party’s capability to stop make it difficult to quell fear. Increase Unrest by 1.

大失败 As failure，but the rumors spread more quickly and have kernels of truth to them. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]]，and at the end of the next day，a Cult event automatically happens.

Urban Outbreak (Event +2).name: Urban Outbreak (Event +2)
Urban Outbreak (Event +2).text:
Dangerous，Settlement

位置 The settlement the PCs are currently located in，or the closest settlement to the PCs’ location if they’re not in a settlement.

事件 A monster blooms from a citizen in the city itself and runs rampage through the streets! The type of monster should be chosen by the GM; its level should equal the party’s level + 2 (a Moderate threat encounter). The PCs can choose to resolve this event with a Kingdom skill check，or they can travel to the settlement the monster is rampaging in to challenge it in encounter mode. If they don’t defeat the monster by the end of the next day，treat this event as having a Critical Failure result.

Kingdom Skill 防御；领导 卫队长

大成功 The monster is defeated before any more lives are lost.

成功 The monster is defeated but slew a citizen. Increase Unrest by 1.

失败 The monster slays several citizens before it is defeated. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and Decay by 1.

大失败 The monster continues to rampage unopposed. This event becomes Continuous and occurs every day until the monster is defeated; additional Cult events still occur as normal. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d6]] and Decay by 2.

The Bard's Trial (Event +0).name: The Bard's Trial (Event +0)
The Bard's Trial (Event +0).text:
Continuous，Downtime，Leadership

A PC spends the day working to fight against the bard's efforts to spread rumors，misinformation，and propaganda against your kingdom. A PC can use Deception to fight fire with fire by slandering or redirecting the bard's efforts to backfire on him. A PC can use Diplomacy to convince the citizens that the kingdom’s leaders are making the right choices and have the nation’s best interests at heart. A PC can use Intimidation to try to frighten the bard out of town or to make citizens wary about speaking out against the government. All three choices can build up Support points，but the repercussions for failing vary according to the skill chosen to fight the bard's efforts. Regardless of the skill chosen，it’s a DC 24 check.

大成功 The party gains 2 Support Points. The next Fight Propaganda check attempted by a PC gains a +2 circumstance bonus as a result of the positive momentum of their efforts.

成功 The party gains 1 Support Point.

失败 The party loses 1 Support Point.

大失败 The party loses 1 Support Point，but also suffers an additional penalty to the kingdom as a whole，depending on which skill check was attempted to Fight Propaganda.

  • Deception The bard exposes some of the PCs’ deceitful acts to the public，inspiring criminals in the kingdom to step up their game using similar tactics performed by the PC. Increase the kingdom’s Crime by 1 and Unrest by 1.

  • Diplomacy The bard seizes on the PC’s poor attempt to be diplomatic and spins those failures into “evidence” of corruption among the city’s leadership. Increase the kingdom’s Corruption by 1 and Unrest by 1.

  • Intimidation The bard takes advantage of the PC’s bullying to drive citizens to engage in riots and vandalism. Increase the kingdom’s Decay by 1 and Unrest by 1.

Support Point Thresholds

As the PCs build Support Points by Fighting Propaganda，they erode The bard's influence over the kingdom. To completely defeat him，the party must achieve 15 Support Points，but the following Support Point thresholds grant additional bonuses along the way.

5 Support Points The skill check that resulted in achieving this threshold gains momentum. As long as the Support Points maintain a minimum threshold of 5，future checks attempted to Fight Propaganda using this same skill gain a +2 status bonus. If Support Points are reduced below 5，this bonus is lost; it can be regained (potentially with a new type of skill) by reaching the threshold of 5 points again.

10 Support Points The bard's campaign has suffered significant setbacks，and he now reduces accumulated Support Points by only 1 per day that the PCs don’t continue to Fight his Propaganda. The party can have him arrested (and move on to the bard's trial) at this point，but doing so is a bit premature and causes those in the kingdom who are still swayed by his influence to become disgruntled. Increase the kingdom’s Unrest by [[/r 1d6]] and Strife by 2.

15 Support Points The bard's campaign is defeated，and the bard can now be arrested without any negative repercussions; move on to the bard's trial.

Discover Desperate Spies (Event +3).name: Discover Desperate Spies (Event +3)
Discover Desperate Spies (Event +3).text:
Continuous，Dangerous，Settlement

位置 The kingdom’s capital city.

事件 The kobold spies slink and skulk around the city，looking for weaknesses to report back to Hargulka and taking advantage of opportunities to perform minor acts of vandalism and sabotage. Once this story event begins，it continues daily for a week. Each day，the kingdom attempts a skill check to resolve the event.

Kingdom Skill Defense or Intrigue (secret)，DC 23; 领导 卫队长

大成功 The two kobold spies are captured and kept imprisoned until the PCs have a chance to speak to them.

成功 Rumors of kobold spies in town begin to spread. Attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11]; on a failure，increase Unrest by 1.

失败 Someone or something in town is causing trouble. Increase Unrest by 1.

大失败 Not only do the kobolds continue to cause trouble (increase Unrest by 1)，but they also perform acts of vandalism and sabotage. Increase Decay by 1.

解决 This daily event ends on a Critical Success or after 7 days have passed.

The Founding of A Village (Event +0).name: The Founding of A Village (Event +0)
The Founding of A Village (Event +0).text:
Beneficial，Hex

位置 Hex Encounter.

事件 The PCs are approached by a ruddy，friendly，and energetic couple. They have plans to establish a village where，until recently，a pair of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.UnWr8QSMq2VZUQhX] dwelled. The couple ask the PCs for support getting their village started.

Kingdom Skill Exploration; 领导 卫队长

大成功 The village is founded. If this hex isn’t part of the PCs’ kingdom，it’s automatically claimed and added to the kingdom. The village is automatically integrated into the kingdom as a village that has 1 Water border. It occupies one block on the Urban Grid，and all 4 of its lots have structures built. These consist of the following: houses，inn，and town hall.

成功 As critical success，but the village isn’t automatically claimed and added to the kingdom unless the PCs have already claimed that hex. Otherwise，the village becomes a freehold.

失败 As success，but clashes with additional @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.UnWr8QSMq2VZUQhX] and other dangerous local monsters cause the PCs to expend additional resources to help the Rezbins found their village. At the start of the next Kingdom turn，the PCs gain 2 fewer Resource Dice.

大失败 The couple and any assistants provided by the PCs are slaughtered by monsters before they can get started. If the PCs haven’t finished this chapter yet，then the couple are captured by trolls，and they could potentially be rescued (after which the couple thankfully return to the task of founding the village，and the PCs automatically gain a success as above). In the short term，the bad news increases Unrest by 1，Decay by 1，and reduces the Resource Dice gained at the start of the next Kingdom turn by 4.

Return of the Mercenaries (Event +0).name: Return of the Mercenaries (Event +0)
Return of the Mercenaries (Event +0).text:
有害

Event After the PCs disrupted the mercenaries’ plans and slaughtered several of their lower-ranking members during the raid on the manor in Chapter 1，the mercenary killers have seethed and plotted. As word of the PCs’ new nation spreads，the mercenaries take note and send a new group of killers south to infiltrate the kingdom. These mercenaries make their presence known by attempting a very public attack on the kingdom to send a clear message to its leaders: They do not forget! Once this kingdom event is completed，whether the mercenaries continue to cause periodic trouble for the PCs is left to you to decide. For example，you could link them to some random events like Assassination Attempts，Bandit Activity，Feuds，Public Scandals，Sensational Crimes，and Vandals.

Kingdom Skill 密谋；领导 特使

大成功 Your agents intercept the mercenaries before they can even get started on their nefarious plans. Reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d4]]，and the next time a random event occurs that includes mercenaries influence，treat the rolled result as one degree of success better than the actual result.

成功 The mercenaries set their plans in motion，but the kingdom’s defenses stop them before they cause any damage. Nevertheless，public knowledge that the mercenaries have taken an interest in the kingdom increases Unrest by 1.

失败 The mercenaries are successful in their plot to attack the kingdom. They publicly rob a caravan of merchants，murder some citizens in broad daylight，or vandalize several buildings while leaving their mark of three black tears as proof of their action. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and one Ruin of your choice by 1.

大失败 As failure，but the mercenaries also manage to establish a foothold in the kingdom. Increase Crime by 2 (this increase stacks with any potential increase to Crime from the Failure result)，and the next time there’s a random event that includes mercenaries influence，treat the rolled result as one degree of success worse than the actual result.

Troll Sightings (Event +0).name: Troll Sightings (Event +0)
Troll Sightings (Event +0).text:
Dangerous，Ongoing

Event Trolls have grown more common and more aggressive along the borders of the kingdom，and their attacks on travelers，hunters，and others coming and going from the kingdom undermine the nation’s sense of safety and well-being.

This event should occur once the PCs reach 5th level，or once they come within one hex of the troll's area. The event then continues to repeat during every Kingdom turn’s event phase automatically until it is resolved，in addition to any other potential events that might take place during the turn.

Kingdom Skill 防御；Leader 卫队长

大成功 The trolls are rebuffed with ease，with no damage to the kingdom. Even better，the kingdom’s scouts manage to track the trolls back to their home，revealing their lair to the PCs.

成功 Kingdom forces manage to hold the trolls back，but worry still spreads—increase Unrest by 1.

失败 The trolls manage to slaughter a few victims despite the kingdom’s best efforts. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and Decay by 1.

大失败 As Failure，but the trolls manage to also invade the kingdom and raze some of its lands. If the kingdom has any Farmlands，one randomly determined Farmland is reduced back to its original terrain and must be rebuilt. If it has no farmlands，one hex along the border is lost.

解决 This event ends once the PCs defeat the trolls

Trouble with a weird gnome (Event +0).name: Trouble with a weird gnome (Event +0)
Trouble with a weird gnome (Event +0).text:
有害

Kingdom Skill 密谋；领导 魔导师

大成功 Kingdom investigators and spellcasters confirm that the weird gnome is likely no gnome at all，but a mischievous trickster fey，potentially from a supernatural place. This knowledge allows your kingdom to both respond to the mischief more quickly and soothes the worries of the citizens. Decrease Unrest by 1.

成功 Kingdom investigators fail to track down the gnome，and while sightings eventually taper off，the damage is done and the citizens continue to worry. Increase Unrest by 1.

失败 No explanation for the weird gnome’s antics are ever arrived at，and in addition to making the citizens uneasy，some of the gnome’s pranks had lasting effects. Increase Unrest by 1 and one Ruin of the party’s choice by 1

大失败 As failure，but increase Unrest by 2 and two Ruins of the party’s choice by 1.

Rampage of the Monster (Event +4).name: Rampage of the Monster (Event +4)
Rampage of the Monster (Event +4).text:
Dangerous，Settlement

位置 A settlement of the GM’s choice (preferably the PCs’ capital city)

事件 The city was attacked by a terrifying monster of immense size that crashed into the town and potentially killed dozens before it had its fill of destruction and lumbered off into the hills.

Kingdom Skill Defense (if the settlement has only Water borders，then the monster has a more difficult time reaching the settlement; increase the rolled result by one degree of success); 领导 Warden (even if the Warden is a PC and thus wasn’t present during this event，the PC’s prior service as the kingdom’s Warden still allows them to influence this event)

大成功 The enormous monster inflicted only relatively minor damage，and while it wounded dozens，miraculously no one was killed. Increase Unrest by 1.

成功 The monster managed to destroy a portion of the city，killed a few citizens，and wounded dozens. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and Decay by 1. Choose one Walled border or one lot with a structure in it; that structure or improvement is destroyed.

失败 The monster rampaged through the settlement，killing dozens and laying waste to structures. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d6]] and Decay by [[/r 1d4]]. Choose one Walled border and two lots with structures in it; those structures and improvements are destroyed.

大失败 As Failure，but the monster’s rampage is even more devastating. Increase Unrest by [[/r 2d4]] and Decay by [[/r 1d6]]. Choose one Walled border and four lots with structures in it; those structures or improvements are destroyed.

解决 If the PCs don’t defeat the monster by the next Kingdom turn，it becomes a Monster Activity event (page 560). Award the PCs 30 Kingdom XP for this event.

Feud (Event +0).name: Feud (Event +0)
Feud (Event +0).text:
持续，有害，定居点

位置 Two settlements of the GM’s choice. If the kingdom doesn’t have at least two settlements，then this event has no effect.

事件 A rivalry between influential groups (nobles，guilds，politicians，etc.) from two different settlements has escalated and may soon turn violent.

王国技能 政治；领导 Counselor

大成功 You mediate the rivals’ differences and not only get them to drop their feud，but also broker an alliance between the two. The feud ends，and the rivals are particularly productive during the next turn. Gain 2 bonus Resource Dice at the beginning of the next Kingdom turn.

成功 You get the rivals to back down，though their mutual dislike simmers behind the scenes. The feud continues into the next turn.

失败 You fail to quiet the rivals and they continue duels，rumormongering，intrigue，and strife. The conflict prevents you from recruiting armies in the two affected settlements until the next Kingdom turn. Increase Unrest by 1.

大失败 The rivals ignore royal commands and disrupt both settlements with their private war. The ongoing feud prevents you from recruiting armies in the two affected settlements until the feud ends. In addition，skirmishing increases Unrest by 2 and one Ruin of your choice by 1; these increases are doubled to 4 Unrest and 2 Ruin if you critically failed this

check last turn.

解决 The feud ends when you achieve a critical success on the check. If this continuous event has occurred for at least 3 consecutive Kingdom turns，you may choose to resolve it at the end of a Kingdom turn by spending 4 Resource Dice of RP to pay off the feuding factions.

Inquisition (Event +1).name: Inquisition (Event +1)
Inquisition (Event +1).text:
持续，有害

事件 Demagogues and zealots mobilize public opinion against a particular ancestry，religion，kingdom，behavior，or leader. This particular inquisition’s dogma and beliefs are driven by a combination of fear，hatred，and ignorance，yet its members are nevertheless compelling and charismatic.

王国技能 民俗；领导 魔导师

大成功 Choose to either pacify or defeat the inquisitors. If you pacify them，the inquisition event ends but the inquisitors remain active—if this event occurs again，they are even more headstrong; increase the event’s level modifier by 2. If you defeat them，the inquisition ends but the violence of the event increases one Ruin of your choice by 1.

成功 You protect the targeted victims of the inquisition，though the inquisition’s ideas continue to spread. Increase Unrest by 1.

失败 The inquisitors strike out in force. Gain [[/r 1d4]] Unrest and increase two Ruins of your choice by 1.

大失败 As failure，but the Inquisition targets a specific structure in one of your settlements (the GM selects a structure appropriate to the inquisition’s nature of intolerance or hatred). Attempt a basic Defense check. If you fail，that structure is reduced to Rubble and increase Decay by 1.

解决 This event continues until you achieve a critical success at resolving the event. Alternately，the inquisition can be ended by having the PCs go on a short quest to infiltrate the inquisition’s headquarters to confront and defeat its leaders.

Justice Prevails (Event +0).name: Justice Prevails (Event +0)
Justice Prevails (Event +0).text:
有益

事件 The authorities catch a notorious criminal，exonerate a wrongfully accused innocent，shut down a major criminal operation，or thwart a plot against a settlement. Whatever the case，some injustice that has long vexed your citizens has finally been resolved.

王国技能 权术；领导 卫队长

大成功 The triumph of law and justice invites celebration. Reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d6]] and reduce each Ruin by 1. Alternately，if you’re suffering from a continuous Bandit Activity，Cult Activity，Drug Den，Inquisition，Sacrifices，Sensational Crime，Squatters，or Vandals event，you can instead cause that event to end.

成功 A celebration of the common good delights the locals. Reduce Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] or reduce two Ruins of your choice by 1 each.

失败 Justice is done，but at a cost of bad publicity. If you don’t Quell Unrest at least once during the next Kingdom turn，the kingdom gains [[/r 1d4]] Unrest at the end of the next turn.

大失败 The victory is undercut by backdoor deals that let the guilty escape justice or reveal unpleasant secrets. Gain [[/r 1d4]] Unrest，2 Crime，and 1 point to another Ruin of your choice.

Sacrifices (Event +2).name: Sacrifices (Event +2)
Sacrifices (Event +2).text:
持续，有害，地块

位置 A claimed hex in the area of influence of a settlement secretly chosen by the GM

事件 A cabal of cultists begin snatching citizens and preparing them for sacrifice to their vile god. The cultists maintain a hidden base of operations somewhere near one of the kingdom’s settlements.

王国技能 Exploration; 领导 特使

大成功 The cultists are defeated，and many of your captured citizens are rescued.

成功 The cult continues to function，but you have managed to determine which hex their base of operations is located in. The DC to defeat the Sacrifices event is reduced by 4 in subsequent turns. Increase Unrest by 1.

失败 The cultists prey on travelers，hunters，trappers，and anyone else who strays too far from civilization. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and one Ruin of your choice by 1.

大失败 As failure，but the cultists start snatching victims from your settlements. If you’ve already determined where they’ve based their operations，they successfully relocate to a new secret hex as chosen by the GM，and the DC to defeat the cultists returns to normal. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d6]] and two Ruins of your choice by 2.

解决 A critical success ends this continuous event. The GM can instead build a short adventure for the PCs to track down and defeat the sinister cultists in encounter mode，provided the PCs know where to go to confront the cultists!

Squatters (Event -1).name: Squatters (Event -1)
Squatters (Event -1).text:
持续，有害，定居点

位置 The settlement with the highest Consumption in the kingdom or the largest settlement in the kingdom (as chosen by the GM)

王国技能 政治；领导 总督

事件 An empty lot in your settlement is taken over by desperate people unable to find adequate work or housing. They set up camp with tents，wagons，and shanties. You cannot use the lot for anything until the squatters are given places to live.

大成功 You find opportunities for the squatters to improve their lot in life.

成功 The squatters are removed from their lot，and they try to relocate and reintegrate with other citizens，but there is some strife. Increase Unrest by 1.

失败 The squatters refuse to leave their lot and other citizens are split，with some decrying their mistreatment while others call for harsh measures to drive them out. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]].

大失败 As failure，but on your next Kingdom turn attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:6]; on failure，the squatters spread to the nearest empty lot in the settlement，creating a separate continuous Squatters event starting with your next Kingdom turn. In addition，the squatters increase the settlement’s Consumption by 1 each month until the event is resolved.

解决 This continuous event ends when you achieve a critical success on the check or when you build a Residential structure in the lot the Squatters have chosen to live in.

特殊 If the settlement has a Sewer System，most of the squatters opt to live there instead; gain a +2 item bonus to checks to resolve this event.

Undead Uprising (Event +0).name: Undead Uprising (Event +0)
Undead Uprising (Event +0).text:
持续，有害，定居点

位置 The settlement with the most cemeteries or (if no settlements have cemeteries) the largest settlement Event A malign force，be it a sinister curse，a nefarious necromancer，or an invasion of ghouls，vampires，or other undead-creating monsters，causes the dead to rise from their graves and threaten the settlement.

王国技能 民俗；领导 魔导师

大成功 The undead are defeated.

成功 The undead are temporarily contained with little physical damage to your settlement，but the populace still grow fearful each night. Increase Unrest by 1.

失败 The undead prey upon your citizens! Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and one Ruin of your choice by 1.

大失败 The undead gain the advantage and bring disaster. Increase Unrest by [[/r 2d4]]，all Ruins by 1，and one non-cemetery lot in your settlement (chosen by the players) is reduced to rubble.

解决 A critical success on the check ends this continuous event. Alternately，the GM can create a short adventure for the PCs to track down and destroy the source of the undead uprising.

特殊 Increase the event’s level modifier by 1 for each Graveyard in the settlement，to a maximum of +4.

Old Devil Comes Calling (Event +3).name: Old Devil Comes Calling (Event +3)
Old Devil Comes Calling (Event +3).text:
Continuous，Dangerous，Settlement

位置 The closest settlement to the kobold's cavern.

事件 The devil (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.i8C4jqI3VdozylBL]{Cornugon}) comes looking for the kobolds，finds them allied with the PCs，and works from behind the scenes in a nearby settlement to wreak havoc and bolster the cult he didn’t know he had，spreading his influence through the kingdom.

Kingdom Skill 密谋；领导 卫队长

大成功 Kingdom agents manage to isolate the source of the diabolic influence: The devil has made a hidden lair within the settlement; the PCs have discovered where this secret den is located，and can finally take direct action to resolve the event (see resolution，below).

成功 The devil’s influence spreads，but the speed of its growth is stemmed by the investigations. Increase Unrest by 1 and one Ruin of the party’s choice by 1.

失败 The devil’s cult gains ground as he begins to destroy the kingdom from within. Increase Unrest by [[/r 1d4]] and three Ruins of the party’s choice by 1.

大失败 As failure，but the devil also corrupts an NPC leader，convincing them to join his cult and abandon their responsibilities to the kingdom. Treat that leadership role as vacant until this event is resolved or the NPC leader is replaced or redeemed.

解决 Once the PCs get a critical success (or at your discretion，after the PCs undertake an adventure of your own design to discover the devil’s lair)，they can drive the devil out of their kingdom by attacking and defeating him (in which case you’ll need to play the battle out in a location of your choice)，or they can attempt a Hire Adventurers activity to do the same. If，by the Event phase of the next Kingdom turn，the devil hasn’t been defeated，he moves to a new settlement and the event continues.

Weather.name: Weather
Weather.text:
By default, when your clock advances to a new day, weather is rolled automatically for the current month. If you prefer rolling manually, turn off auto rolling in the settings and use the provided @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-macros.Macro.JRURoF9WSle1Waud]{Roll Weather} macro or manage it manually with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-macros.Macro.HrP9RsXVhlfn6wNS]{Set Current Weather} macro.

Visual effects rely on the built-in weather effects. This means that all scenes' weather effects will be overridden by the currently active weather when viewing that scene.

If you want to allow a certain scene to override this behavior, use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-macros.Macro.RA7iXfcHQlsiNcj6]{Scene Weather Settings} macro and disable syncing weather. Note that this will also prevent the usage of the Set Current Weather macro, but you can decide to reuse the weather playlist functionality by enabling Sync Weather Playlist in the scene's weather settings.

If your party moves indoors, you can disable the current weather effect using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-macros.Macro.ZHxd6N09A2QCayS0]{Toggle Shelter from Weather}

In addition, you can configure sound effects that are played by creating playlists with the following names:

  • weather.sunny

  • weather.rain

  • weather.snow

  • weather.fog

  • weather.blizzard

  • weather.rainStorm

  • weather.leaves

Official Adventure Integration

If you are using the official module, rain, snow, rainStorm and blizzard are autoconfigured for you, but you can still override the mechanism by creating the appropriately named playlists
